value.0:
Your guide to large and advanced weapons:

You will require access to proper materials such as iron, steel, or even more valuable metals. Then, you must have access to a proper workstation, an anvil is required for armory.


Greataxe:
Begin with the Bellows twice.  Then twice with the hammer and twice with the tongs.

Greatsword:
To forge this item begin with the bellows and tongs.  Two strikes with the hammer ending with tongs and bellows again.

Halberd:
The halberd begins with the bellows twice.  Then the hammer.  Two more times with the bellows and ends with the tongs.

Scythe:
Use the tongs twice followed by the hammer.  Move on to the tongs, hammer and bellows.

Dire Mace:
Use the bellows and the bellows again. Once done move on to the tongs, then the hammer twice.  Finish with the bellows.

Two Bladed Sword:
Start with the bellows then hammer.  Use the bellows twice again and finish with the tongs.

Kama:
Use the tongs twice. then the bellows.  Move to the hammer twice and then the bellows.

Katana:
The Katana starts with two strikes of the hammer, followed by the bellows twice.  Complete it with the hammer and tongs.

Double Axe:
Begin with the bellows and hammer then repeat.  To finish, change the order and use the hammer and then bellows.
